paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the BRCA2 gene along with penetrance data from a cohort study.

patients.phenotype: Clinical events possibly caused by the variant

individual_records.phenotype_details: Clinical event possibly caused by the variant
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Of 24 confirmed carriers of these variants, we observed at least one clinical event possibly caused by the variant in only three participants (13%).

functional_data.summary: Functional impact not detailed in the paper.

variants.evidence_level: Low to moderate, based on clinical events observed.
variants.additional_notes: Two additional carriers of a single variant in BRCA2 were identified but were found to be false positives by Sanger validation.
key_quotes: Of 24 confirmed carriers of these variants, we observed at least one clinical event possibly caused by the variant in only three participants (13%).
